name: Fantasy Mosaics 15: Ancient Land
description: Enjoy new multi-color mosaic puzzles in prehistoric settings! Join the penguin family on a journey to an ancient land and discover the mysteries of the penguin ancestors! Enjoy this new collection of mosaic puzzles in a variety of colors while exploring the prehistoric landscape.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP,Vista,7,8,10 Processor: 1.6 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 110 MB available space
